GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an array of all articles, with pagination support. Defaults to sorting by 'created_at' in descending order.
GET /api/articles.topic_queries: any existing topic in the database

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: retrieves an article by its id
